name: PR Wise
description: PR Wise, with offices in Dublin and Cork, offers extensive experience and expertise in the delivery of public relations, including Corporate, B2B and Consumer PR, for leading Irish and international companies or organisations. Value and results are at the core of our PR and communications services. Our public relations experts will communicate your message effectively to your target market: business, technology, and consumer.

locations.address: Regus Dublin, Ormond Building, Office 309, 31-36 Ormond Quay Upper
